            <p> A team project where we saw a need for students who were leaving Rexburg who needed a ride, or were willing to offer one.             <p>Programmed in C language and loaded onto a Nucleo board, the alarm triggers only when it is armed and the magnetic switches (simulating a door or window opening) are pulled apart.
